title: MD5反作弊机制你怎么看？
author: 5igm1
txt_content:
长期以来一些通过md5来反作弊的客户端或插件或mod，至少在中国长盛不衰。近期，由于服要升级1.10而anticheat还没有1.10的版本，我试图请人帮忙做个同样原理的反作弊的插件/mod，结果得到了这样一段答复

A couple things to note here incase:If you're using cryptographic hashes to validate clients files/plugins/mods you're completely at the mercy of the client. Seeing as how the client is running your code. This means it can easily be bypassed by just grabbing the right hash, and sending that regardless of what is actually there. You could theoretically find a way to do this, but you'd be one of a handful of people who's ever accomplished this, and it wouldn't really be feasible.If you are using Cryptographic Hashes MD5 is a really poor choice. MD5 has been broken for years. If you do decide this is still the route you want to go, use a strong work based hash instead of a fast hash. It'll be slower work based hash. With strong work based values.Again following the same lines don't expect this to be a fail-safe catch-all solution. There isn't one for anticheating. The best solution is to have strong mods/admins/owners doing their job, and fairly looking at players, sneaking, checking, and just generally making sure everything is running smoothly.

总结下来一句话，MD5不行的，很容易被绕开。不知道各位大触怎么看？

replies.author: ZhangJiaMinglv
replies.txt_content:
先不论MD5自身安全性啥的，如那段英文的第一项所说的。因为客户端能很简单地就可以给服务器发假数据了. .
你服务器验证所有MOD的MD5，那么在客户端就可以先运行一次正常的，抓了那个发给服务器的MD5，然后将checksum删掉，以后就在连接服务器时给服务器发那个MD5，然后就可以自己随便装MOD了。所以并没有什么用。

唯一解决方法是，不要相信客户端所发过去的数据。全部行动都在服务器端验证一次（累死

关键不在于md5本身的安全性，而是这种方法的安全性。也就是关键是“反作弊机制”而不是“MD5”。
从理论上要做到100%反作弊的客户端是绝不可能的，因此加密方法不是重点。
